channel.title: CVE Feed for imagerecycle -- ImageRecycle pdf & image compression
channel.description: The latest CVEs for imagerecycle -- ImageRecycle pdf & image compression

item.title: CVE-2024-0984|2024-02-20T18:56:45.626Z -- imagerecycle -- imagerecycle%20pdf%20%26%20image%20compression
item.description: The ImageRecycle pdf & image compression plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the disableOptimization function in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.13. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to disable the image optimization setting.
